string.text: Do you sell ammo?
I only sell cartridges for the M-134 minigun which, as you know, are pretty rare around here!
How much?
One box, 2500Ru plus a Medusa artefact
Wow, that's pretty steep, isn't it?
That's the price, take it or leave it. There's no shortage of customers for this stuff...
Okay. Here...
Thanks, but no thanks...
Do you have any 'special' weapons?
I've got one of the finest weapons in the Zone - a sniper rifle with a smart scope. In the right hands, it's a terrific 'one shot - one kill' weapon. Just don't expect it to come cheaply...
How much?
120,000Ru plus a Pudding artefact.
It must be one hell of a rifle!
Oh, indeed it is. And it comes with my personal guarantee. If it doesn't save your life, bring it back for a full refund. No questions asked...
Okay, you've got yourself a deal
Wow! I don't have that kind of money. Another time, maybe...
You got any special items?
I can sell you a coded lock. Perfect for keeping your stash safe...
Is theft a problem in the Zone?
Well, it's just as bad as anywhere else really, only a lot worse!
How much for one?
20,000Ru plus a Quirk artefact
Okay, I'll take a lock
Sorry, not interested...
